option.t-att-selected: country.id == partner.country_id.id if partner else false
prov.id == partner.province_id.id if partner else false
city.id == partner.city_id.id if partner else false
barangay.id == partner.barangay_id.id if partner else false

tr.t-att-class: 'pro_service_row kps_empt empty-row-height' if(len(partner.product_service_offered_line.ids) == 0) else 'pro_service_row kps_empt empty-row-height v_display_none'

template.name: Key Products and Serivces Offered Creation
